languages.text: Однако никто в Просторе не ведал, сколь ужаснее была ее судьба на самом деле. Потрясенная изменой {mf|того|той}, котор{mf|ого|ую} любила, Кибелла испытала страдание столь губительное, что реальность расступилась под ее ногами. С той поры по Простору поползли слухи о жутком отродье варпа, что принимало облик девы в алом и являлось к гадателям и толкователям судьбы. Оно велело им рассказать судьбу свое{mf|го|й} Домин, возлюблюбленн{mf|ого|ой}, а после жестоко и богопротивно расправлялось. На плоти их оно вырезало изображение карты Таро Императора — карты Чудовища.

However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet. Ever since then, a rumour spread through the Expanse of a terrifying creature of the warp that took the shape of a maiden in scarlet and manifested itself to diviners and fortune-tellers. It commanded them to tell it the fate of its beloved Domin, and then murdered them in cruel and unholy ways. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.
languages.original_text: Однако никто в Просторе не ведал, сколь ужаснее была ее судьба на самом деле. traits.locale_text: However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet, and the Immaterium swallowed her. Ever since then, a rumour spread through the Expanse of a terrifying creature of the warp that took the shape of a maiden in scarlet and manifested itself to augurs and fortune-tellers. It commanded them to tell it the fate of its beloved Domin, and then murdered them in cruel and ungodly ways. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.

The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.

languages.text: Allerdings erfuhr niemand in der Ausdehnung vom wahren Ausmaß und Entsetzen ihres Schicksals. Vom Verrat {mf|ihres|ihrer} Liebsten erschüttert, verlor Kibellah die Realität unter ihren Füßen. Seitdem verbreitete sich in der Ausdehnung ein Gerücht über eine schreckliche Kreatur des Warp in Gestalt einer purpurnen Jungfrau, die sich Sehern und Wahrsagern offenbarte. Sie befahl ihnen, ihr vom Schicksal {mf|ihres|ihrer} geliebten Domin zu erzählen und ermordete sie dann auf grausame und unheilige Art und Weise. Das tote Fleisch ihrer Opfer trug das Bild einer der Karten aus dem Tarot des Imperators: das Monster.
languages.original_text: However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.

traits.locale_text: Allerdings erfuhr niemand in der Ausdehnung vom wahren Ausmaß und Entsetzen ihres Schicksals. Vom Verrat {mf|ihres|ihrer} Liebsten erschüttert, verlor Kibellah die Realität unter ihren Füßen und wurde vom Immaterium verschlungen. Seitdem verbreitete sich in der Ausdehnung ein Gerücht über eine schreckliche Kreatur des Warp in Gestalt einer purpurnen Jungfrau, die sich Sehern und Wahrsagern offenbarte. Sie befahl ihnen, ihr vom Schicksal {mf|ihres|ihrer} geliebten Domin zu erzählen und ermordete sie dann auf grausame und unheilige Art und Weise. Das tote Fleisch ihrer Opfer trug das Bild einer der Karten aus dem Tarot des Imperators: das Monster.

Allerdings erfuhr niemand in der Ausdehnung vom wahren Ausmaß und Entsetzen ihres Schicksals. Vom Verrat {mf|ihres|ihrer} Liebsten erschüttert, verlor Kibellah die Realität unter ihren Füßen und wurde vom Immaterium verschlungen. Seitdem verbreitete sich in der Ausdehnung ein Gerücht über eine schreckliche Kreatur des Warp in Gestalt einer purpurnen Jungfrau, die sich Sehern und Wahrsagern offenbarte. Sie befahl ihnen, ihr vom Schicksal {mf|ihres|ihrer} geliebten Domin zu erzählen und ermordete sie dann auf grausame und unheilige Art und Weise. Das tote Fleisch ihrer Opfer trug das Bild einer der Karten aus dem Tarot des Imperators: das Monster.

languages.text: Cependant, personne dans les Étendues ne sut jamais le sort atroce qui fut le sien. Dévastée par la félonie de l'{mf|élu|élue} de son cœur, Kibellah s'abîma dans une souffrance telle que la réalité elle-même se déroba sous ses pieds. Par la suite, les Étendues se mirent à bruire d'une rumeur étrange : une effroyable créature du Warp ayant pris l'apparence d'une vierge vêtue d'écarlate serait apparue aux yeux des devins et des diseurs de bonne aventure pour leur ordonner de lui révéler le sort de {mf|son bien-aimé|sa bien-aimée} Domin avant de leur infliger une mort cruelle et impie. Sur les chairs mortes de ses victimes était gravée l'image d'un arcane du tarot de l'Empereur : le Monstre.
languages.original_text: However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet. Ever since then, a rumour spread through the Expanse of a terrifying creature of the warp that took the shape of a maiden in scarlet and manifested itself to diviners and fortune-tellers. It commanded them to tell it the fate of its beloved Domin, and then murdered them in cruel and unholy ways. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, personne dans les Étendues ne sut jamais le sort atroce qui fut le sien. Dévastée par la félonie de l'{mf|élu|élue} de son cœur, Kibellah s'abîma dans une souffrance telle que la réalité elle-même se déroba sous ses pieds. Par la suite, les Étendues se mirent à bruire d'une rumeur étrange : une effroyable créature du Warp ayant pris l'apparence d'une vierge vêtue d'écarlate serait apparue aux yeux des devins et des diseurs de bonne aventure pour leur ordonner de lui révéler le sort de {mf|son bien-aimé|sa bien-aimée} Domin avant de leur infliger une mort cruelle et impie. Sur les chairs mortes de ses victimes était gravée l'image d'un arcane du tarot de l'Empereur : le Monstre.

languages.text: Sin embargo, nadie en la Extensión llegó a descubrir el verdadero horror de su destino. Desolada por la traición de la persona a la que amaba, el sufrimiento de Kibellah fue tan aplastante que la realidad misma se hundió bajo sus pies. Desde entonces, por la Extensión corren rumores de una criatura aterradora en la disformidad que adopta la forma de una doncella vestida de escarlata, que se manifiesta ante adivinos y videntes. Les ordena que revelen el destino de su amad{mf|o|a} Domin antes de matarlos de forma espantosa y blasfema. En la carne muerta de sus víctimas está tallada la imagen de una carta del Tarot del Emperador: el Monstruo.
languages.original_text: However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet. Ever since then, a rumour spread through the Expanse of a terrifying creature of the warp that took the shape of a maiden in scarlet and manifested itself to diviners and fortune-tellers. It commanded them to tell it the fate of its beloved Domin, and then murdered them in cruel and unholy ways. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, nadie en la Extensión llegó a descubrir el verdadero horror de su destino. Desolada por la traición de la persona a la que amaba, el sufrimiento de Kibellah fue tan aplastante que la realidad misma se hundió bajo sus pies, dejando que el Inmaterio la devorara. Desde entonces, por la Extensión corren rumores de una criatura aterradora en la disformidad que adopta la forma de una doncella vestida de escarlata, que se manifiesta ante adivinos y videntes. Les ordena que revelen el destino de su amad{mf|o|a} Domin antes de matarlos de forma espantosa y blasfema. En la carne muerta de sus víctimas está tallada la imagen de una carta del Tarot del Emperador: el Monstruo.

languages.text: しかし、エクスパンスにある誰一人として、彼女の運命の真の恐ろしさを理解していなかった。愛する者の裏切りに打ちのめされたキベラの苦しみは破滅的なものだった。現実そのものが足元で崩れ去りました。それ以降、緋色の乙女の姿をした恐ろしい<歪み>の生き物が預言者や占い師たちの前に姿を現すという噂がエクスパンス中に広まった。それは愛するドミンの運命を告げよと命じ、その後、残酷かつ不浄な手段で彼らを殺害した。犠牲者の死体には、皇帝陛下の占い札の「怪物」の絵が刻まれていた。
languages.original_text: However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet. Ever since then, a rumour spread through the Expanse of a terrifying creature of the warp that took the shape of a maiden in scarlet and manifested itself to diviners and fortune-tellers. It commanded them to tell it the fate of its beloved Domin, and then murdered them in cruel and unholy ways. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.

traits.locale_text: しかし、エクスパンスにある誰一人として、彼女の運命の真の恐ろしさを理解していなかった。愛する者の裏切りに打ちのめされたキベラの苦しみは破滅的なものだった。現実そのものが足元で崩れ去り、非物質世界が彼女を飲み込んだ。それ以降、緋色の乙女の姿をした恐ろしい<歪み>の生き物が預言者や占い師たちの前に姿を現すという噂がエクスパンス中に広まった。それは愛するドミンの運命を告げよと命じ、その後、残酷かつ不浄な手段で彼らを殺害した。犠牲者の死体には、皇帝陛下の占い札の「怪物」の絵が刻まれていた。

しかし、エクスパンスにある誰一人として、彼女の運命の真の恐ろしさを理解していなかった。愛する者の裏切りに打ちのめされたキベラの苦しみは破滅的なものだった。現実そのものが足元で崩れ去り、非物質世界が彼女を飲み込んだ。それ以降、緋色の乙女の姿をした恐ろしい<歪み>の生き物が預言者や占い師たちの前に姿を現すという噂がエクスパンス中に広まった。それは愛するドミンの運命を告げよと命じ、その後、残酷かつ不浄な手段で彼らを殺害した。犠牲者の死体には、皇帝陛下の占い札の「怪物」の絵が刻まれていた。

languages.text: 然而，科罗努斯扩区没人知道她遭遇了多么可怕的命运。绮贝菈遭到了深爱之人的背叛，她的精神被彻底摧毁。她的痛苦是如此恐怖，就连现实本身都在她的脚下崩塌。在那之后，科罗努斯扩区出现了传闻，说亚空间之中出现了一只可怕的怪物。那是个穿着一袭红衣的少女，会出现在占卜者与算命师面前。它会告诉那些人，说它心爱的秘者遭遇了怎样的命运，之后以残暴、邪恶的方式将受害者杀害。受害者的尸体上会刻着帝皇塔罗牌的图案，这张牌的意思是——怪物。
languages.original_text: However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet. Ever since then, a rumour spread through the Expanse of a terrifying creature of the warp that took the shape of a maiden in scarlet and manifested itself to diviners and fortune-tellers. It commanded them to tell it the fate of its beloved Domin, and then murdered them in cruel and unholy ways. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.

traits.locale_text: 然而，科罗努斯扩区没人知道她遭遇了多么可怕的命运。绮贝菈遭到了深爱之人的背叛，她的精神被彻底摧毁。她的痛苦是如此恐怖，就连现实本身都在她的脚下崩塌。在那之后，科罗努斯扩区出现了传闻，说亚空间之中出现了一只可怕的怪物。那是个穿着一袭红衣的少女，会出现在占卜者与算命师面前。它会告诉那些人，说它心爱的秘者遭遇了怎样的命运，之后以残暴、邪恶的方式将受害者杀害。受害者的尸体上会刻着帝皇塔罗牌的图案，这张牌的意思是——怪物。

然而，科罗努斯扩区没人知道她遭遇了多么可怕的命运。绮贝菈遭到了深爱之人的背叛，她的精神被彻底摧毁。她的痛苦是如此恐怖，就连现实本身都在她的脚下崩塌，亚空间吞噬了她。在那之后，科罗努斯扩区出现了传闻，说亚空间之中出现了一只可怕的怪物。那是个穿着一袭红衣的少女，会出现在占卜者与算命师面前。它会告诉那些人，说它心爱的秘者遭遇了怎样的命运，之后以残暴、邪恶的方式将受害者杀害。受害者的尸体上会刻着帝皇塔罗牌的图案，这张牌的意思是——怪物。

languages.text: Ancak Enginlik'teki herkes, çok daha dehşet verici hakiki akıbetinden bihaberdi. Bir vakitler sevdiği birinin ihanetiyle perişan hâle gelen Kibellah'nın çektiği acı, öylesine tahrip ediciydi ki hakikat artık ona ayak bağı oluyordu. O zamandan beri Enginlik'te korkunç bir öteboyut canavarına dair bir söylenti anlatılagelir. Bu canavar, kızıla bürünmüş genç bir kadının suretini alarak kâhinlerin ve medyumların karşısına çıkarmış. Onlara kıymetli Domini'nin akıbetini anlatmalarını emreder, ardından da gaddar ve günahkâr şekillerde canlarını alırmış. Kurbanlarının ölü etlerine İmparator'un Tarotu'ndaki bir kartın, Canavar'ın suretini kazırmış.
languages.original_text: However, none in the Expanse were the wiser as to the true and greater horror of her fate. Devastated by the treachery of the one she loved, Kibellah's suffering was so ruinous that reality itself gave way under her feet. Ever since then, a rumour spread through the Expanse of a terrifying creature of the warp that took the shape of a maiden in scarlet and manifested itself to diviners and fortune-tellers. It commanded them to tell it the fate of its beloved Domin, and then murdered them in cruel and unholy ways. The dead flesh of its victims bore the carved image of a card from the Emperor's Tarot: the Monster.
